pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sensitivity Analysis of a Meta-analysis with Unpublished but Registered Analytical Investigations // This package contains R functions to gauge the impact of unpublished studies upon the meta-analytic summary effect of a set of published studies. (Credits: The research leading to these results has received funding from the European Union's Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007-2013) under grant agreement no. 282574.)
